revisions.rev:
[[File:Televisa Regional Logo.png|thumb|180px|Televisa Regional logo]] '''Televisa Regional''' refers to Televisa owned television stations that broadcast select programming from Televisa's [[Canal de las Estrellas]], [[FOROtv]], [[Canal 5 (Televisa Network)|Canal 5]], and/or [[GalavisiÃ³n (Mexico)|GalavisiÃ³n]], [[Televisa Networks]] and locally produced programming. Each Televisa Regional station brands itself independently such as [[XHAB-TV|Vallevision]], [[XHLAR|Televisa Nuevo Laredo]], [[XHTPZ-TV|Televisa del Golfo]], and [[XHCVI-TV|Televisa Victoria]] yet they all form Televisa Tamaulipas and share programming.[http://www.televisa.com/programas/tv-abierta-local/ Televisa TV Abierta Local] '''Televisa local''' refers to independently owned television stations in Mexico that also broadcast select programming from Televisa's four broadcast networks and locally produced prgramming. Some form regional alliances that share programming specially regional news such as as [[XHRCG-TV|Siete Saltillo]][http://www.rcg.com.mx/ RCG Siete Saltillo website] in the state of [[Coahuila]] and [[XHI-TV|TV Pacifico]] in the states of [[Sinaloa]] and [[Sonora]].[http://www.canaltres.com.mx/ TV Pacifico website] ==List of Televisa Regional stations== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
